channel.title: Help Sorting
channel.description:
does any one know how to sort these ints accending or decending? [code]aClassArray[i].anInt001[/code] i need to get [b]anInt001[/b] accending or decending.. and possiably get the i value for it ;P if any one can or knows how help will be appreciated heres what the values look like
aClassArray[1].anInt001 = 1000 aClassArray[2].anInt001 = 200 aClassArray[3].anInt001 = 70000 aClassArray[4].anInt001 = 212 aClassArray[5].anInt001 = 33 aClassArray[6].anInt001 = 0 aClassArray[7].anInt001 = 0
i need to change that to
aClassArray[3].anInt001 = 70000 aClassArray[1].anInt001 = 1000 aClassArray[4].anInt001 = 212 aClassArray[2].anInt001 = 200 aClassArray[5].anInt001 = 33 aClassArray[6].anInt001 = 0 aClassArray[7].anInt001 = 0

item.title: Help Sorting
item.dc:creator: @kiaz kiaz
item.description:
@kiaz wrote:

com’on… no need for spam

ive tryed Arrays.sort(); tryed other methods at doing what i want,

if any one knows how to sort an classarray[] with a int value in the class array by accending order…
please post now…
[br][size=1]Posted on: 02 July 2007, 19:40:13[/size][hr]Help anyone?
